name: fLiGhT (itch) (GmanAdvanced)
description:
A small endless game where you have to survive against waves of Ravens. Programming:

-netgfx -> Raven flying
-Tiamalt -> WASP
-Hosahu -> Background3
-bart -> sky1 Music:

(Original by Nikolai Rimsky-Korsakov Arranged and looped by Johan Brodd)

-Kistol -> Game Over II (Work In Progress: Fixing the screen size adjustments. Please don't go full screen for now thanks :) FINALLY FIXED)
